page.title: 07HOBBIES
page.content: " One of my hobbies is my herb garden.I've got Sage,Gingermint, Peppermint,Thyme,Camomile,Oregano, Fennel,Chives,Parsley,Rosemary and Chervil-there's also some Basil in the greenhouse,that aren't yet big enough to be planted out.My herbs are popular with Mum too,and she sends me out every other night to get some for cooking.They make good presents,too- when the Lavender was growing I made a Lavender bag:Dad {begged }me to put it away when it was in the lounge once,as it was getting up his nose!It was only 5ft long,but now_thanks to Dad_it's 30ft. On rainy days,I can still have fun with herbs by invading the kitchen with all my herb books telling about all the delicious herby recipies I think we should try.The Parsley,Sausage & Apple Flan,for
